Text:
(I'm supposed to meet Alpha here, but...did I get
the time right?)

(It's not like Alpha to ask me to meet her during
the day...)
(What is she up to? ...Now I'm actually curious!)
Cid, sorry to keep you waiting.
No, not at all... Huh?
...Alpha, what's with that outfit...?

Heheh. Judging by your reaction...it seems you can
see me clearly.

Y-Yeah...I can see you clearly. In fact, you look a
bit too conspicuous.
Don't worry, not with this slime suit.

Actually, only those with large amounts of magic
can detect the wearer. It's an application of your
Shadow Wisdom.
(Did I teach her that...?)

Besides, you said before, right? "It makes no sense
to wear black during the day."
(I don't remember saying that...but that's spot on!)
That made me realize.

We are beings of the shadows, and while we're often
active at night, that doesn't mean we don't operate
during the day...

Which means we need clothes that are easy to move in
during the day, something that allows us to slip by
unnoticed and complete our missions, right?

(...Jeez, one casual remark results in the creation
of mysterious tech in this world...)

(I've gotta be careful with what I say from now on.
They take the most insignificant comments and run
with them in the most unexpected ways...)
So, um...what do you think?

Well, it sounds good. If only people with lots of
magic can see it, we could do a lot with it.
That's true, but...
...Do I look good in it...?

Oh, yeah. Different from your usual vibe, but I
think it suits you.
R-Really...? I'm glad you think so...

(She seems so embarrassed... She must be worried
about standing out after all.)

By the way, did you ask to meet me just to show off
this suit?
No, of course not, that's not the only reason.

Since passersby can't see me, but you can see me
clearly, there's only one thing to do, right?
One thing...?

Let's take a walk in the city together. Proudly side
by side, okay?
Right, right. Gotcha.

(Alpha really can't wait to show off the suit's
capabilities, huh? She has a surprisingly
childish side to her.)
I don't have any plans, so I'll join you.
Thanks. In that case...
...Aren't you a little too close?

Oh, you worry too much. It's fine. No one's paying
us any mind.

Anyway, where would you like to go? A caf?
Or would you prefer to go shopping?

Take me to places today...that we normally can't go
together.

Sure, but won't it look strange to people with low
levels of magic?

True, it might look like you're talking to thin air.
In that case...

I'll try not to talk, so can I walk closer next to
you instead?
...Do what you want.
Then, um...can I hold your arm?

You don't have to go that far... Well, if they can't
see you, then I guess it's okay.

And so, Alpha enjoyed her secret outing with Cid to
the fullest...
